text: Hi. This question is about Julia on <http://mybinder.org|mybinder.org>. I have a package on my Project.toml that is not registered, it is taken directly from github, but mybinder seems not to like that and is throwing an error. Is there a work around?

text: check also the Manifest in your repository

text: Oh, Manifest.toml is being gitignored. I will comment out that line and try again. Thanks a lot!
